boardgame.name: Castle Dice
boardgame.description: Castle Dice is a light dice-drafting game in which the players have been ordered by the king to build castles along the borders of the kingdom. The player who can create the greatest castle will become the new heir to the throne. Players will explore the land by rolling the dice, and then take turns gathering resources from them. These resources are then used to hire workers and improve castles. Players must gather and spend wisely as the Barbarians from the neighboring lands will attack players and steal their resources throughout the game. At the end of seven turns, the player who has built the greatest castle (earned the most victory points) wins the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: English first edition Publisher: Fun to 11

Fun to 11 (F2110003) Castle Dice is a Dice Drafting, Tactical, Worker Placement, board game of castle building in a barbarian infested frontier land for 2-4 players. To win, a player will have to build up their settlement with workers and gather the correct resources to complete upgrades to their castle all while holding back the barbarians raids.

Played only a few times. Still like new! Cost: $33 Shipping: $9 If you purchase this with at least one other game I have listed for sale (Alphabet Dice Game, Clubs, Rattus, Saboteur 2, Take It or Leave It)I will lower the prices of all games _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; combine shipping on all games that are ordered.
